attributes.action: Ban Islamic extremism in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban Islamic extremism in the uk, Nazism in the UK is illegal so make this illegal. Why should we let people on our streets of Britian tell us that one day we will become an Islamic state. We beat Nazism. We beat communism. Now lets beat Islamization.

rejection.details: While the Government can proscribe extremist groups, it cannot "ban" concepts.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
